scripts.build: npm run build.utils && npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.example-library && npm run build.framework-libraries
scripts.build.angular: npm run build.utils && lerna run build --stream --scope=@stencil/angular-output-target && lerna run build.angular-library && lerna run build --stream --no-bail --scope=component-library-angular
scripts.build.react: npm run build.utils && lerna run build --stream --scope=@stencil/react-output-target && lerna run build.react-library && lerna run build --stream --no-bail --scope=component-library-react
scripts.build.vue: npm run build.utils && lerna run build --stream --scope=@stencil/vue-output-target && lerna run build.vue-library && lerna run build --stream --no-bail --scope=component-library-vue
scripts.build.svelte: npm run build.utils && lerna run build --stream --scope=@stencil/svelte-output-target && lerna run build.svelte-library && lerna run build --stream --no-bail --scope=component-library-svelte
scripts.clean: npm run clean.npm && npm run clean.lockfiles && npm run clean.stencil-cache && npm run clean.dist
